abstract: The two companies are expanding a 10-month-old collaboration in an effort to accelerate their sales of customer management and office software to businesses.
snippet: The two companies are expanding a 10-month-old collaboration in an effort to accelerate their sales of customer management and office software to businesses.
lead_paragraph: Google and Salesforce.com, two of Microsoft’s most conspicuous rivals, are expanding a 10-month-old collaboration in an effort to accelerate their sales of customer management and office software to businesses.

headline.main: Google and Salesforce Join to Fight Microsoft
headline.print_headline: Google and Salesforce Join to Fight Microsoft
